articles.title: The Tor Project forced to lay off one-third of its staff - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The Tor Project has announced that it has had to let go 13 employees, which counts for one-third of its core workforce. Entirely funded by donations, the team has been forced to make the lay offs due to the effects of COVID-19.
articles.content: The Tor Project has taken to its blog to announce that is has to lay off one-third of its workforce. The cutbacks have been forced upon the Massachusetts-based internet privacy focused non-profit as a result of the COVID-19 crisis which has seen donations dry… [+1396 chars]
